body: What steps will reproduce the problem? When transformed, it can attack the turn it came under control (like it has Haste) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? If permanent (i.e. land) comes into play and then transformed into creature, it can't attack because it has "summoning sickness". What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.35
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Inkmoth Nexus

comments.body:
I am unable to replicate this. I created a game with Inkmoth Nexus in hand, play is as the land for this turn, then activate its ability. It was not able to attack in that turn. It will be very useful if you can send the game.log file to magarena@googlecode.com when you notice the problem again.

**Status:** CantReproduce
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Forget to mention that Nexus was under control of AI.
comments.author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)

comments.body: Thanks for the update, will check again using AI.

content:
_From [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/) on March 06, 2013 21:07:26_

What steps will reproduce the problem? When transformed, it can attack the turn it came under control (like it has Haste) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? If permanent (i.e. land) comes into play and then transformed into creature, it can't attack because it has "summoning sickness". What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.35

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=333_
